charges.charge_disposition: CT: 1 Dft comm to the cust of BOP for 84 days w/credit for ti served. Upon rel frm impris, dft shall be placed on supv rel for a term of 3 yrs under the following terms &; cond's, subject to the state hold frm Mississippi. Dft shall comply w/rules &; reg of the PO &; GO 318; all fines are waived, including the costs of impris &; supv, as it is found tht dft does not hv the ability to pay. Ord tht dft shall pay to the US a s/a of $50.00. Ord tht the period of supv rel, does not begin to run until any term of custodial ti imposed, in the case in Mississippi. Dft informed of right to appeal (1)
